name: Wade Gray
title: CEO
definition: Founder and 'CEO' of our company. He is responsible of the financial status of the company and growth. He targets to grow the company every financial quarter time-line.

name: Cheryl Gamble
title: Project Manager
definition: Responsible of a projects every major decision. All critical changes must be approved by her. She is the direct contact to our 'CEO'.

name: Elizabeth McCarthy
title: Senior Developer
definition: Final reviews of all completed and tested codes comes to her to double check and increase the efficiency of the code.

name: Wendy Sweet
title: Junior Developer
definition: Most of the hard coding created by her to be checked by 'Senior Developer' and 'Project Manager'.

name: Cory Keller
title: Intern
definition: Responsible of most basic tasks to be done to ease the heavy work of other developers and to increase his skills.
